metadata.dc:author: Rosales Ricardo, Yury
Rosales Paneque, Fredy Rafael
metadata.dc:description: A literature review was conducted with a view to propose a new definition for burnout syndrome (BS) among university students, as a two-dimensional syndrome, where the two essential or core dimensions of BS are student exhaustion and student apathy and disinterest. It eliminates the third dimension of efficacy or academic self-efficacy in the specific case of students for not meeting the situational and conceptual requirements of the syndrome per se.
metadata.dc:title: Hacia un estudio bidimensional del SÃ­ndrome de Burnout en estudiantes universitarios.
[Towards a two-dimensional study of burnout syndrome in college students].
